alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 2:46PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Putnam and eastern Clay Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 246 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near George`s Lake, or 12 miles southwest of Green Cove Springs, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Green Cove Springs, Fleming Island, George`s Lake and Penney Farms. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam
